data.what_is:
Marketing automation platform that allows you to perform advanced segmentations, create multichannel workflows and personalise your users' experience based on their behaviour.

Connectif puts the power of data into the hands of marketers.

We enable you to track the online behavior of all your clients, even anonymous users, to help you personalize your marketing efforts and increase conversions by delivering the right message to the right audience.

Interact effortlessly with your customers through automated workflows to deliver hyper-personalized experiences. Make use of over 100 predefined templates that best suit your marketing strategies, or quickly build your own on the fly.

Follow the user on their customer journey in real time, and choose the most effective channel to communicate with them for maximum results. 

Access advanced dashboards and personalized reports based on hundreds of metrics to help you stay ahead of the market and make better decisions for your business. 

Get ready to unlock the full potential of your ecommerce business with Connectif!

Know more here: https://youtu.be/PQSzL7yMPng
data.product_description: Marketing automation platform that allows you to perform advanced segmentations, create multichannel workflows and personalise your users' experience based on their behaviour.

initial_reviews.review_title: Data-driven, omni-channel and unconstrained marketing automation tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Connectif?
Great technology and accessible and close human team, resolute when it comes to offering help and alternatives depending on the needs of its customers. It has a very good customer service with very fast response times.

Su libertad de programacion nos permite implementar un sin fin de estrategias digitales exitosas en todos los canales y personalizada a la tipologia de usuario y cliente del eccomercce.

What do you dislike about Connectif?
In some areas of implementation it may require multidisciplinary expertise.

What problems is Connectif solving and how is that benefiting you?
Connectif is a key tool for the growth of eccomerces being able to impact on any type of user or customer in a precise way which allows to implement digital growth strategies easily.

initial_reviews.review_title: Workflows omnichannel and embedded content on the web
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Connectif?
You can do almost any workflow you can imagine and put dynamic content on the web.

What do you dislike about Connectif?
SPAM complaints are not handled automatically and it does not offer plain text in emails

What problems is Connectif solving and how is that benefiting you?
Create complex abandoned cart with related products.
Being able to take leads from native web forms
